ComicInfo.Title: Angel; Turning Point
ComicInfo.Summary: The world's mightiest man is back -- and that spells trouble! Mighty Man returns, and it's no cause for celebration as his rampage threatens to level what's left of the Windy City! What hope does Malcolm Dragon have against the most powerful being to ever walk the face of the Earth?
ComicInfo.Notes: Tagged with ComicTagger 1.6.0a13.dev122 using info from Grand Comics Database on 2024-06-17 23:18:44. [Issue ID 815728]
ComicInfo.Colorist: Mike Toris,Nikos Koutsis,Jason Thibodeaux,Jason Thibodeaux,Nikos Koutsis,Mike Toris
ComicInfo.Characters: Jabar,Spectacular Dragon,Daredevil,Angel Murphy,Captain Stewart,Mighty Man,Hannibal Jones,Overlord,Dee Dee Wilson,Frankie Johnson,Moregore,Fast Willie Jackson,Malcolm Dragon,Jo-Jo
